_header: Have mind on the bliss that never shall blin

CULFf238.First Lines:
Haue mynde on the blys þat neuer schall blyneAnd on grete
                    peyne þat synners shall wynne…
CULFf238.Last Lines:
…of fyue ynwyttys þe rewle ys thysThat helpen a man to
                    heuene blys
CULFf238.Attributed Title: here sue þe v goostly wyttys (f. 32va)
CULFf238.Facsimiles:
McSparran,  Frances,  and  Pamela R. Robinson.  
             “Introduction.” 
             Cambridge University Library MS Ff.2.38.
         London: Scolar Press, 1979.
CULFf238.Editions:
Person,  Henry Axel. 
             Cambridge Middle English Lyrics.
         Seattle: University of Washington Press, 1953; rev. ed. 1962: 24.

CamMagPep1584.First Lines:
Haue mynde on þe blis þat nevir schall blynand on þe
                    great payn þat synnys schall wyn…
CamMagPep1584.Last Lines:
…Of fyve in wittes þe Rule is thisThat helpith a man to
                    heuyn
CamMagPep1584.Attributed Title:
Þise be þe fywe wyttes gostly (f. 107v); The v wittes
                    gostly (RT)

BLHar1706.First Lines: Haue mynde on blysse þat neuer schalle blynneAnd on grete peynes þat synners schul wynne…
BLHar1706.Last Lines: …Off þi fyue wyttys þe rewle ys þisThat bryngen a man to heuene blysse
BLHar1706.Note: Latin terms for the five spiritual senses written in rubric in outer margins beside first lines relatin to each.
BLHar1706.Attributed Title: Quinque sensus spiritualiter (rubric preceding first line, f. 207v)
BLHar1706.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library Harley MS 1706.
         https://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?index=0&ref=Harley_MS_1706.

BLHar2339.First Lines:
Haue mynde on þe blis þat neuer schal blynne& on
                    greet peyne þat synners schal wynne…
BLHar2339.Last Lines:
…Of fyue in wittis þe rule is þisÞat helpen a
                    man to heuene blis
BLHar2339.Attributed Title:
Þese ben þi fyue wittis goostly (rubricated, f.
                    121v)

Ushaw28.First Lines:
Haue mynde on þat blisse þat neuer shalle blynne& on
                    þe grete peynes þat synnes shal wyn…
Ushaw28.Last Lines:
…of fyue wittis þe rewle is þisþat helpith a
                    man to heuen blisse
Ushaw28.Note:
In the Speculum Christiani, Tercia Tabula, with headings
                        Memoria, Voluntas, Racio, Intellectus, Ymaginacio.
